title: Campandgoslow Brown Trout Tape Restocked
content:
Campandgoslow has just restocked its Brown Trout bar tape. This playful pattern is inspired by the tough and elusive Brown Trout. You know the fish the USFS drops from helicopters into alpine lakes and can live in cut bank streams only 12″ wide and 30″ deep. Those fish.

Like GCS’ other tapes, it’s made from super durable, custom-dyed nylon yarn, although this version has a softer, smother feel than the Eastern and Western Rattler tapes. The colors were chosen to look great with your favorite leather saddle and play nice with our Rattler-trimmed bags and accessories.

You get two 3300mm rolls packaged in a high-quality mesh drawstring bag. The tape is backed with 1.5mm of foam for a little cushion on the rough stuff.

Bartape made in Taiwan
Bag cut and sewn in Seattle

Check out more at Campandgoslow.

The post Campandgoslow Brown Trout Tape Restocked appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
